name: BanTheHackers Support Badge
author: BanTheHackers

sections.description: Show your support for BanTheHackers with a drop down badge. The badge uses minimal real estate showing only a small red bookmark icon on the top right of your website. When a user mouses over this the badge drops down with the “We Support BanTheHackers” message. The message if clicked links your visitors through to BanTheHackers
sections.installation:
1. Upload BanTheHackers.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What is BanTheHackers?

BanTheHackers.tk is a website aimed at exposing hackers in MapleStory, a game published by Nexon.

Do you hate hackers?

Yes, yes we do.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Corrected a possible error users may experience with editing header information.

1.0.1

  • Call changed to wp_head instead of wp_footer.

1.0

  • Plugin Launch.
